mapper.select: select ca.category_shift categoryShift,ca.userrole_start userroleStart,ca.userrole_over userroleOver, s.staff_name staffName,s.staff_phone staffPhone,ar.arrange_start "Start",ar.arrange_end "End",me.medical_name medicalName,ca.color Color from arrange ar left join staff s on ar.staff_id =s.staff_id left join category ca on ar.category_id = ca.category_id left join medical me on s.medical_id = me.medical_id where s.staff_id = #{staffId}
